scripts.build: rm -rf dist && parcel build src/handler.js --target node
scripts.predeploy: yarn run build && yarn run prepare:sharp
scripts.prepare:sharp: rm -rf node_modules/sharp && SHARP_IGNORE_GLOBAL_LIBVIPS=1 npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux --target=8.10.0 sharp
scripts.reset:sharp: rm -rf node_modules/sharp package-lock.json && yarn add sharp
